title: 2020 Pan American Wrestling Olympic Qualification Tournament
text:
The 2020 Olympic Wrestling Pan American Qualification Tournament was the first regional qualifying tournament for the <a href="2020%20Summer%20Olympics">2020 Summer Olympics</a>. The event was held from 13 to 15 March 2020, in <a href="Ottawa">Ottawa</a>, <a href="Canada">Canada</a>.
Qualification summary.
A total of 36 athletes secured a spot in the 2020 Summer Olympics, in <a href="Tokyo">Tokyo</a>. Two spots were given to each of the weight classes. This allows a total of 12 available spots for each event. Every winner and runner-up per class were awarded their place for <a href="Wrestling%20at%20the%202020%20Summer%20Olympics">wrestling</a>, at the 2020 Summer Olympics. Quota places are allocated to the respective NOC and not to competitor that achieved the place in the qualification event.
